author.particle: is Lecturer in Archaeology at the University of

note: John Rich is Lecturer in Classics at the University of Nottingham. T.E.Rihll (formerly Research Fellow in the Schools of History and Geography at the University of Leeds) is Lecturer in Classics at St David’s University College, Lampeter. AM.Snodgrass is Laurence Professor of Classical Archaeology in the University of Cambridge. Andrew Wallace-Hadrill is Professor of Classics at the University of Reading A.G.Wilson is Professor of Urban and Regional Geography at the University of Leeds.
title: Mireille Corbier is a Research Fellow at the C.N.R.S., Paris. Martin Milieu is Lecturer in Roman Archaeology at the University of Durham. Ian Morris is Professor in Greek History at the University of Chicago. Robin Osborne is Fellow and Tutor in Ancient History at Corpus Christi College, Oxford. John R.Patterson is a Fellow of Magdalene College, Cambridge and University Assistant Lecturer in Ancient History. Dominic Perring is former Research Assistant in Roman Archaeology at the University of Leicester. T.W.Potter is Deputy Keeper in the Department of Prehistoric and Romano-British Antiquities at the British Museum
